remarks: The reflexive, transitive closure is indeed transitive.  (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.)  (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
statement:
rtrclreclem.rel $e |- ( ph -> Rel R ) $.
rtrclreclem.rex $e |- ( ph -> R e. _V ) $.
rtrclreclem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( t*rec ` R ) o. ( t*rec ` R ) ) C_ ( t*rec ` R ) ) $.
